name: Name
passwordLengthMessage: Please input a password with at least 6 characters.
errorTokenNotValid: Token is not valid. Please login again.
errorEmailAlreadyExists: There already exists an account with this email.
errorPasswordsNotMatching: Passwords did not match! Please try again.
errorSoleOwnerOfHousehold: You are the owner of {{householdCount}} households. Please go to each household and give another user the owner role. Those are {{households}}.
errorNotAllowedPaymentCreation: You are not allowed to create a payment in this household.
errorNotAllowedRecurringPaymentCreation: You are not allowed to create a recurring payment in this household.
errorNotAllowedRecurringPaymentUpdating: You are not allowed to change a recurring payment in this household.
errorLeaveGroupSoleOwner: Cant leave this group as you are the last owner. Please make sure someone else is a owner of the group.
errorRemoveOwnerRoleNotAllowed: Cant remove the owner role, because the group would then be without any owner.
errorSoleOwnerOfGroup: You are the owner of {{groupCount}} groups. Please go to each group and give another user the owner role. Those are {{groups}}.
errorCreateInviteNotAllowedHousehold: You are not allowed to create a new invite in this household.
errorCreateInviteNotAllowedGroup: You are not allowed to create a new invite in this group.
errorNoInviteFound: No invite found with this token.
errorInviteNotForEmail: Invite was not created for your email address.
